title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 90.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 90.2 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part applies to open-end accounts which are established
by lending institutions and which provide for changes in the rate charged on
the account from time to time but not more often than once within any
three-month period. The use of indices for such open-end accounts must comply
with the provisions of Part 333 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
90.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
